titleStmt.title: England's backwardnesse or A lingring party in bringing back a lawful King. Delivered in a sermon at Waltham Abbey Church in the county of Essex, at a solemne fast. / By Thomas Reeve D.D. preacher of Gods word in that parish.
titleStmt.author: Reeve, Thomas, 1594-1672.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for William Grantham, at the black Bear in S. Paul's Church yard, near the little north door,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the black Bear in S. Paul's Church yard, near the little north door
